Info

Defines class TemplateDir with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for checking project template directory.

class gen_avr8.pro.template_dir.TemplateDir[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class TemplateDir with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for checking project template directory.

It defines:

attributes:
_GEN_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
_CONF_DIR - Configuration directory path.
_TEMPLATE_DIR - Template directory path.
methods:
check_dir - Checks project directory.
setup_conf_dir - Sets configuration directory.
setup_template_dir - Sets template directory.
_CONF_DIR: str = '/../conf/'¶
_GEN_VERBOSE: str = 'GEN_AVR8::PRO::_TEMPLATE_DIR'¶
_TEMPLATE_DIR: str = '/../conf/template/'¶
classmethod check_dir(target_dir: str | None, verbose: bool = False) → bool[source]¶

Checks project directory.

Parameters:

  • target_dir (<str> | <NoneType>) – Target directory to be checked | None

  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Returns:

True (directory ok) | False

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

None
